title: Is there any way to install a custom skin on a Mac?
body: Leaguecraft's skin installer has no Mac version so I'd like to know if there is a way. Thanks!

replies.body:
Not sure! We definitely don't recommend using custom skins installers, since those programs can potentially hide features you aren't aware of and put your account at risk. While we don't support these programs, choosing to do so is *at your own risk*. 

You can find our official stance on third-party programs [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications). Let me know if you have any questions.
